then echo "Skipping keymap replacements" else sed -i 's/layouts=us,ru/layouts='"${xkbmap}"',us/g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/xkb-plugin-12581166590.rc sed -i 's/display_type=0/display_type=1/g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/xkb-plugin-12581166590.rc sed -i 's/variants=,winkeys/variants=,/g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/xkb-plugin-12581166590.rc touch /home/surfer/.lesslinux/keymaps.replaced fi fi

[Desktop Entry] Version=1.0 Encoding=UTF-8 Type=Application Name=FileZilla Comment= Categories=CB-Other; Exec=/usr/bin/filezilla Icon=gnome-fs-network Terminal=false StartupNotify=true
